import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; class Users extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { selectedRole: '', users: [], error: null, }; } componentDidMount() { // Make the GET API call when the component is mounted fetch('http://localhost/react/epicpro-backend/get_users.php') // fetch('https://cors-anywhere.herokuapp.com/https://abundantpractices.com/hr/get_users.php') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => { if (data.status === 'success') { this.setState({ users: data.data }); } else { this.setState({ error: data.message }); } }) .catch(err => { this.setState({ error: 'Failed to fetch data' }); console.error(err); }); } handleSelectChange = (event) => { this.setState({ selectedRole: event.target.value, }); }; handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log("Selected Role:", this.state.selectedRole); }; render() { const { fixNavbar } = this.props; const { selectedRole, users, error } = this.state; return ( <>
